Articles.Content: Here I have created a new space plane that I have dubbed the 'A-9 Lunacy'. A standard two engine craft with a top speed of Mach 2 at an altitude of 14,750 meters. This plane gets some of its inspiration from the A-10 Warthog. > ![300px-A-10_Thunderbolt_II_In-flight-2.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/cf/A-10_Thunderbolt_II_In-flight-2.jpg/300px-A-10_Thunderbolt_II_In-flight-2.jpg) (I say some rather loosely though, doesn\'t look like it at all.) **Screenshots:** **It in the SPH:** > ![PDTuG.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/PDTuG.jpg) **Nearing it\'s top speed and altitude:** > ![556uc.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/556uc.jpg) Not responsible to the tail wiggling off in the lower atmosphere*
